goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 379 KB)
indicator_definition: Forest area as a proportion of total land area
indicator_name: Forest area as a proportion of total land area
target_name: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
indicator_description: A summary of green area in bristol by the percentage of tree canopy cover available in bristol and the number of hectares for every 100,000 people
computation_definitions: The percentage of tree canopy cover available in bristol and the number of hectares for every 100,000 people
computation_calculations: No calculations were performed and the data is presented as found
